node.title: House where Cleo Smith was found unremarkable, but today it's the nation's focus
node.alt: A car under a carport behind a fence, outside a house in Carnarvon.
node.description: The houseÂ where missing four-year-old Cleo Smith was found is unremarkable in every way, yet today it is the centre of one of the biggest police investigations in Western Australian history.
node.content:
["It's an ordinary-looking house on an ordinary street, just a few minutes' walk from the centre of the coastal town of Carnarvon, 900 hot and dusty kilometres from Perth.", "But, today, it is far from ordinary.", "The now heavily guarded but modest dwelling has become the focus of one of the biggest police investigations Western Australia has ever seen: It's the house where missing four-year-old Cleo Smith was found.", "And it's just 3\u00a0kilometres from Cleo's family home.", "At precisely 12:46am on Wednesday, police forced their way into the locked house that\u00a0is surrounded by the red dirt that is so ubiquitous in\u00a0the region.", "Inside, they made the longed-for discovery many feared would never eventuate.", "Little Cleo Smith, on her own, alive and apparently well.", "An officer scooped the little girl into his arms and asked her name.", "\"My name is Cleo,\" she said, confirming that police intelligence had indeed been spot-on.", "
Close to Cleo's family home
", "The house, in the working-class\u00a0suburb of Brockman, is near where the Gascoyne River meets the Indian Ocean, and just under 1km\u00a0from the town's main street.", "It's also just a short drive from Cleo's own home, the house where she and her mum, Ellie, stepdad, Jake Gliddons, and baby sister, Isla, live.", "", "
The house where Cleo Smith was found has been taped off by police.(ABC News)
", "It's more than two weeks since the young family of four packed up their gear on a Friday afternoon and drove an hour north, to the area known by locals as Carnarvon's playground, the Blowholes campgrounds\u00a0on Quobba Station.", "Arriving as it began to get dark, the family pitched their tent then settled in for the night.", "Cleo woke at around 1:30am, asking for a drink of water, which her mother gave her, before settling her back to sleep.", "However, when baby Isla woke around 6am, Cleo \u2014 and her red sleeping bag \u2014 were nowhere to be found.", "
Tight-knit Carnarvon community
", "Carnarvon is a town of just 5,500 residents\u00a0and locals say the community is a tight-knit one.", "Despite that, police say the man who lives in the house where the four-year-old was found, and who is now in police custody, was not known to her family.", "", "
Police forensic officers have been gathering evidence at the house in Carnarvon where Cleo Smith was found.(ABC News: Evelyn Manfield)
", "Police had described the search for the preschooler as like looking for a needle in a haystack, and\u00a0Initial investigations had focussed on the remote campgrounds\u00a0from where she was taken.", "Yet, in the end, she was found just 3km\u00a0from her own family home.", "Found alone when police smashed their way in, Cleo had been locked into the two-bedroom, one bathroom property that looks like most other homes in the town.", "It's surrounded by a Colourbond fence that's about a 1.5-metres\u00a0high and property documents suggest it is\u00a0owned by the state government's housing authority, Homeswest.", "Little is known about the occupant, other than he's 36 years old and appears to have been living there alone.", "Neighbour Rebecca Ryan, who has lived in the neighbourhood for about 17 years, said the man often seemed to be in a hurry.", "\"I see him every day, taking off in a car like he is in a rush \u2026\u00a0like he's paranoid,\" she said.", "", "
Neighbour Rebecca Ryan lives near the house in Carnarvon where Cleo Smith was found.\u00a0(ABC News: Evelyn Manfield)
", "Other neighbours have said he was seen recently buying nappies, which raised questions for them.", "Whether it was that information or something else that led police to the door of the unremarkable house has yet to be revealed.", "For now, it remains surrounded by police tape and an ever-growing pack of media."]
